entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Fort Frances
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:52 PM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Frances 01:00 AM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Temperature: -1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -1.7°C
Wind: S 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or flurries. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 6:25 PM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 6:25 PM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 6:25 PM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023
